snippet: Ms. Wallace will be a digital correspondent, working primarily for CNN.com and appearing regularly on television.
abstract: Media decoder blog; CNN announces it will rehire Kelly Wallace, former correspondent, as it continues talent recruitment effort led by Jeff Zucker.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Wallace will be a digital correspondent, working primarily for CNN.com and appearing regularly on television.

headline.seo: Kelly Wallace to Return to CNN
headline.main: CNN Rehires Kelly Wallace, Primarily as Digital Reporter
headline.print_headline: CNN Rehires Kelly Wallace, Primarily as Digital Reporter
